rooms.name: Main Living Area
rooms.description: Open plan living space including dining and lounge areas, connected to the garden via sliding glass doors. Designed with natural ventilation and daylighting as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining space adjacent to the main living area, designed for hosting guests. Includes natural light through large north-facing windows as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom, ensuring privacy and aligning the bed's headboard to the north for positive energy flow. Eco-friendly materials used.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom designed with ample storage and natural lighting, featuring Vastu-aligned placement for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom (Child)
rooms.description: Child-friendly bedroom space, brightened by north-facing windows to encourage growth and learning.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Multipurpose room that can serve as a study or office area. Windows are oriented towards the north for improved focus.

rooms.name: Family Toilet
rooms.description: Well-ventilated family restroom, designed to serve guests and residents with eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.name: North-Facing Entrance
openings.description: Main entrance is located on the north side of the villa, ensuring a positive flow of energy according to Vastu principles.

openings.name: East and West Windows
openings.description: Strategically placed windows for cross ventilation while balancing natural light. Also designed for privacy.

garage.description: Two-car garage with eco-friendly ventilation and natural lighting. Located on the ground level.

outdoor_spaces.name: Garden
outdoor_spaces.description: Expansive garden area designed to promote biodiversity, water conservation through rainwater harvesting, and outdoor leisure spaces.

outdoor_spaces.name: Swimming Pool
outdoor_spaces.description: Eco-friendly swimming pool with natural filtration systems and shaded areas for relaxation.
